actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to designate certain entitites organized to participate in States workmen's compensation assigned risk insurance plans as tax-exempt entities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to designate certain entities organized to participate in State workers' compensation assigned risk insurance plans as tax-exempt entities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to designate certain entitites organized to participate in States workmen's compensation assigned risk insurance plans as tax-exempt entities.
